heroSection.description: Meticulously dried and packed in natural peach skin, Mokalot's peaches offer a burst of fruity sweetness anytime you need it. Treat yourself to a healthy snack that's simply delicious and rich in nutrients!

problemSection.description: Say goodbye to unhealthy snacking options that leave you feeling guilty. With Jojolo, indulge in a delightful, naturally sweet treat that nourishes your body and soul.

problem.title: Before Jojolo
points: Feeling guilty about unhealthy eating habits
Struggling to find nutritious and tasty snacks
Lacking energy due to poor snack choices
Missing out on the joy of guilt-free indulgence

solution.title: After Jojolo
points: Enjoy guilt-free snacking with natural sweetness
Nourish your body with a healthy snack option
Experience a burst of energy and vitality
Indulge in delicious treats without the guilt
Rediscover the joy of snacking mindfully

featuresSection.title: Pure Peach Goodness
featuresSection.description: Savor the natural goodness of peaches packed in each bite. Experience the perfect balance of sweetness and nutrition.

featuresSection.title: Convenient & Healthy
featuresSection.description: Enjoy a snack that's convenient to carry and healthier than most options. Jojolo is your go-to choice for guilt-free indulgence on-the-go.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to commonly asked questions about our services.

items.question: How can I reset my password?
items.answer: To reset your password, go to the login page, click 'Forgot password?', and follow the instructions.

items.question: How do I update my billing information?
items.answer: You can update your billing information from the account settings under the 'Billing' section.

items.question: How can I contact customer support?
items.answer: You can contact our customer support via email or through the live chat on our website.

items.question: How do I delete my account?
items.answer: To delete your account, go to settings and select 'Delete Account' or contact support.
